instance functorCategoryPreadditive : Preadditive (C ⥤ D) where
  homGroup F G :=
    { add_assoc := by
        intros
        ext
        apply add_assoc
      zero_add := by
        intros
        ext
        apply zero_add
      add_zero := by
        intros
        ext
        apply add_zero
      neg_add_cancel := by
        intros
        dsimp only
        ext
        apply neg_add_cancel }
